Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Ensure the shirt is placed inside the sink

        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to wash

        wash(shirt) # Wash the shirt

        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it off after washing
            
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink
        clean_shirt(shirt, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

def has_washing_machine():
    # Determine whether there is a washing machine available in the environment
    symbol has_machine = exists machine: item: is_washing_machine(machine)
    return has_machine

behavior wash_shirt(shirt: item, wash_machine: item):
    body:
        if dirty(shirt):
            # Ensure that the shirt is initially dirty before washing
            achieve inside(shirt, wash_machine)
            # Place the shirt inside the washing machine
            achieve is_on(wash_machine)
            # Ensure the washing machine is turned on to wash the shirt

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt to be washed
        if has_washing_machine():
            bind wash_machine: item where:
                is_washing_machine(wash_machine)
            # Select the washing machine
            wash_shirt(shirt, wash_machine)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']
